scripts.stop: pm2 stop libraverse_server && pm2 delete libraverse_server
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:functional --timeout 10000
scripts.test:unit: . ./.env.local.test && npm run lint && NODE_ENV=test mocha --require tests/__setup.js --require tests/unit/__hooks.js tests/unit/ --recursive --timeout 1000
scripts.test:integration: . ./.env.local.test && npm run lint && NODE_ENV=test mocha tests/integration/ --require tests/__setup.js --require tests/integration/__hooks.js --recursive --timeout 10000 --startupDB
scripts.test:functional: . ./.env.local.test && npm run lint && NODE_ENV=test mocha tests/functional/ --require tests/functional/__hooks.js --recursive --timeout 30000 --startupDB
